segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman drying a plate, completely focused on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is running water, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing onto the floor, making a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in the water, and she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, reaching up for a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, all tidy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the mom hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
